bitenum.description: Module in reset
Activates SPI

register.description: Maps the interrupts to different interrupt lines.

bitfield.description: Slave in, Master out data in
Slave out, master in data out write
Slave out, master in dataout set.

bitenum.description: Write: 0: Has no effect 1: Logic 1 placed on SPISOMI pin. Read 0: Current Value on SPISOMI pin is logic 0. 1: Current value on SPISOMI pin is logic 1.
Write: 0: Has no effect 1: Logic 1 placed on SPISIMO pin. Read 0: Current Value on SPISIMO pin is logic 0. 1: Current value on SPISIMO pin is logic 1.
Write: 0: Has no effect 1: Logic 1 placed on SPICLK pin. Read 0: Current Value on SPICLK pin is logic 0. 1: Current value on SPICLK pin is logic 1.
Write: 0: Has no effect 1: Logic 1 placed on SPIENA pin. Read 0: Current Value on SPIENA pin is logic 0. 1: Current value on SPIENA pin is logic 1.
Write: 0: Has no effect 1: Logic 1 placed on SPISOMI pin. Read 0: Current Value on SPISOMI pin is logic 0. 1: Current value on SPISOMI pin is logic 1.
Write: 0: Has no effect 1: Logic 1 placed on SPISIMO pin. Read 0: Current Value on SPISIMO pin is logic 0. 1: Current value on SPISIMO pin is logic 1.
Write: 0: Has no effect 1: Logic 1 placed on SPICLK pin. Read 0: Current Value on SPICLK pin is logic 0. 1: Current value on SPICLK pin is logic 1.
Write: 0: Has no effect 1: Logic 1 placed on SPIENA pin. Read 0: Current Value on SPIENA pin is logic 0. 1: Current value on SPIENA pin is logic 1.
Write: 0: Has no effect 1: Logic 1 placed on SPISOMI pin. Read 0: Current Value on SPISOMI pin is logic 0. 1: Current value on SPISOMI pin is logic 1.
Write: 0: Has no effect 1: Logic 1 placed on SPISIMO pin. Read 0: Current Value on SPISIMO pin is logic 0. 1: Current value on SPISIMO pin is logic 1.
Write: 0: Has no effect 1: Logic 1 placed on SPICLK pin. Read 0: Current Value on SPICLK pin is logic 0. 1: Current value on SPICLK pin is logic 1.
Write: 0: Has no effect 1: Logic 1 placed on SPIENA pin. Read 0: Current Value on SPIENA pin is logic 0. 1: Current value on SPIENA pin is logic 1.

bitfield.description: Slave out, master in dataout clear.

bitenum.description: Write: 0: Has no effect 1: Logic 0 placed on SPISOMI pin. Read 0: Current Value on SPISOMI pin is logic 0. 1: Current value on SPISOMI pin is logic 1.
Write: 0: Has no effect 1: Logic 0 placed on SPISIMO pin. Read 0: Current Value on SPISIMO pin is logic 0. 1: Current value on SPISIMO pin is logic 1.
Write: 0: Has no effect 1: Logic 0 placed on SPICLK pin. Read 0: Current Value on SPICLK pin is logic 0. 1: Current value on SPICLK pin is logic 1.
Write: 0: Has no effect 1: Logic 0 placed on SPIENA pin. Read 0: Current Value on SPIENA pin is logic 0. 1: Current value on SPIENA pin is logic 1.
Write: 0: Has no effect 1: Logic 0 placed on SPISOMI pin. Read 0: Current Value on SPISOMI pin is logic 0. 1: Current value on SPISOMI pin is logic 1.
Write: 0: Has no effect 1: Logic 0 placed on SPISIMO pin. Read 0: Current Value on SPISIMO pin is logic 0. 1: Current value on SPISIMO pin is logic 1.
Write: 0: Has no effect 1: Logic 0 placed on SPICLK pin. Read 0: Current Value on SPICLK pin is logic 0. 1: Current value on SPICLK pin is logic 1.
Write: 0: Has no effect 1: Logic 0 placed on SPIENA pin. Read 0: Current Value on SPIENA pin is logic 0. 1: Current value on SPIENA pin is logic 1.
Write: 0: Has no effect 1: Logic 0 placed on SPISOMI pin. Read 0: Current Value on SPISOMI pin is logic 0. 1: Current value on SPISOMI pin is logic 1.
Write: 0: Has no effect 1: Logic 0 placed on SPISIMO pin. Read 0: Current Value on SPISIMO pin is logic 0. 1: Current value on SPISIMO pin is logic 1.
Write: 0: Has no effect 1: Logic 0 placed on SPICLK pin. Read 0: Current Value on SPICLK pin is logic 0. 1: Current value on SPICLK pin is logic 1.
Write: 0: Has no effect 1: Logic 0 placed on SPIENA pin. Read 0: Current Value on SPIENA pin is logic 0. 1: Current value on SPIENA pin is logic 1.

bitfield.description: Slave out, master in Open Drain Enable

bitenum.description: SOMIDIR=1, SOMIDOUT=1 0: Output value on SPISOMI pin is .ogic 1 1: Output value on SPISOMI pin is Tri-stated.
0: Output value on SPISIMO pin is logic '1'. 1: Output value on SPISIMO pin is Tri-stated.
0: Output value on SPICLK is logic '1'. 1: Output value on SPICLK is Tr-stated.
0: Output value on SPIENA pin is logic '1'. 1:Output value on SPIENA pin is tri-stated.
0: Output value on SPISCSx pinis logic '1'. 1: Output value on SPISCSx is tri-stated.

bitfield.description: Slave out, master in Pull Control Enable

bitenum.description: SOMIDIR=0 0: Pull Control on SPISOMI pin is enabled. 1: Pull Control on SPISOMI pin is Disabled.

bitfield.description: Slave in, Master out Pull Control Enable

bitenum.description: 0: Pull Control on SPISIMO pin is enabled. 1: Pull Control on SPISIMO pin is Disabled.
0: Pull Control on SPICLK is enabled. 1: Pull Control on SPICLK is Disabled
0: Pull Control on SPIENA pin is enabled. 1:Pull Control on SPIENA pin is disabled..
0: Pull Control on SPISCSx pin is enabled. 1: Pull Control on SPISCSx is disabled.

bitfield.description: Slave out, master in Pull Select

bitenum.description: SOMIDIR=0 0: Pull Control on SPISOMI pin is enabled. 1: Pull Control on SPISOMI pin is Disabled.

bitfield.description: Slave in, Master out Pull Select

bitenum.description: 0: Pull Control on SPISIMO pin is enabled. 1: Pull Control on SPISIMO pin is Disabled.
0: Pull Control on SPICLK is enabled. 1: Pull Control on SPICLK is Disabled
0: Pull Control on SPIENA pin is enabled. 1:Pull Control on SPIENA pin is disabled..
0: Pull Control on SPISCSx pin is enabled. 1: Pull Control on SPISCSx is disabled.
0: Chip Select de-activated. 1: Chip Select active.
0: No Delay Inserted. 1: After the transaction WDELAY of the corresponding data format is loaded into the delay counter.
00: DWF 0 selected. 01; DWF 1 selected. 10: DWF 2 selected. 11: DWF 3 selected.

bitfield.description: Bit error: mismatch of the transmitted data and internal transmit data.
